attributes.action: Pay rise for NHS front line staff
attributes.additional_details: This is simple, ask anyone on the street if front line NHS workers deserve a proper pay rise and the answer will be an emphatic yes! Do not allow the money to be swallowed up by the management systems with more going to directors just pay those that have been on the front line saving tens of thousands of lives during this pandemic and suffering themselves in the process. These people have been struggling financially and yet once again have proved their value to the entire county.
attributes.background: Our NHS front line staff have literally been dying to help the public during the Covid pandemic. The have gone above and beyond the call of duty to care for us, the general public and have proved their value to society over and again. How many dead without them? Pay them what they are worth!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151

We should increase the pay of our NHS staff by 25%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563356
